name: impact-foos
description: This is a WIP ranking system for the IMPACT foosball tournament.

scripts.deploy: copyfiles *.js *.css index.html public && copyfiles ./node_modules/lit-html-element/lit-element.js ./node_modules/lit-html/lib/lit-extended.js ./node_modules/lit-html/lit-html.js -u 1 public & copyfiles assets/* public & firebase deploy

author: Filip Bech-Larsen
